document_data.caption: Spycatcher Westband, with two of the spies he caught.
document_data.name: Westband
document_data.mainbody:
'''Westband''' was a soldier who served as a spycatcher of the [[Neverwinter Guard]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter}}
{{Quote|The name's Westband. Neverwinter's sent me to combat the Blackdagger Bandits' spies. It's a big job, and I could use some help. In fact, I've got a little contest going to make it worth your time.|Westband, to the [[Hero of the Sleeping Dragon Bridge]].}}
document_data.Activities: He was tasked with apprehending, and specifically not killing, spies that worked against Neverwinter and its interests.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Spycatcher Westband was operating out of the [[Broken Crown]] inn located on the [[High Road]] near [[Cragmire Keep]]. He worked with passing adventurers to catch members of the [[Blackdagger Bandits]] that were operating as spies in the region and retrieve any information they carried.
